quests.name: Faith, Trust, and Pixel Dust
objectives:
Participate in the DreamSnaps Challenge:
  ‧ Snap a photo with the Tag requirements seen in the DreamSnaps menu.
Talk to Vanellope in the Dream Castle.
Place Vanellope's House in the Village.
Use the Scrooge McDuck sign to pay for the construction of Vanellope's House.
Welcome Vanellope.
Welcome Vanellope to Dreamlight Valley.

quests.name: Extreme Biome Makeover
objectives: Plant the 10 Candy Seeds anywhere in the Valley.
Water the 10 Candy Cane Sprouts and Harvest them after a minute.
Bring the Candy Cane Sprouts to Vanellope.

Make a Candy Biome by decorating near Vanellope's House with:
  ‧ 50 Deluxe Sugar Cookie Pavement to make a race track.
  ‧ 5 Candy Cane Trees.
  ‧ 5 Giant Lollipops.
Talk to Vanellope.

Cook the kart parts:
  ‧ 1 Sugar Kart Tail.
  ‧ 1 Sugar Kart Seat.
  ‧ 4 Sugar Kart Wheel.
Bring the kart parts to Vanellope.

Gather spare parts from WALL-E's House:
  ‧ 3 Electronic junk.
  ‧ 2 A power source for the kart.
Ask a Villager for something to glue a kart together.

Gather kart parts:
  ‧ 3 Electronic Chip.
  ‧ 2 Spare Batteries.
  ‧ 1 Super Sticky Frosting.
Bring the kart parts to Vanellope.

quests.name: Ready Player Fun
objectives:
Show Vanellope some Valley hobbies:
  ‧ 3 Mine any gem.
  ‧ 5 Catch ay fish.
  ‧ 30 Plant any crops.
  ‧ 30 Harvest any crops or fruit.
Talk to Vanellope.
Go into Scrooge McDuck's Store to let Vanellope hide.
Find Vanellope's "dark and dangerous" hiding spot.

(Optional) Ask Villagers for hints about Vanellope's hiding spot:
  ‧ Nala.
  ‧ Mickey Mouse.
  ‧ Mirabel.
Search for Vanellope in a dark and dusty place on the Sunlit Plateau.
Follow the candy trail inside the Vitalys Mines to find Vanellope.
You found her! Talk to Vanellope.
Race Vanellope to the outside entrance of the Mine.
Talk to Vanellope.

Catch three fish before time runs out.
  ‧ Catch any fish (3) as fast as you can.
  ‧ You have THREE minutes! GO GO GO!
Return to Vanellope.

quests.name: Boss Up
objectives:
Prepare "potions" for Boss Fights:
  ‧ Healing, AKA Raspberry (Raspberry Boba Tea).
  ‧ Strength, AKA Mint (Mint Boba Tea).
  ‧ Agility, AKA Coconut (Coconut Boba Tea).
Talk to Vanellope.
Enter Ursula's House.
"Battle" Ursula in her House.
Regroup with Vanellope.
Find a "mystical sword" in the Forest of Valor.
Unearth the sword in the stump using your Shovel.
Pick up the Clothing Bag in the Forest and unlock it from your Inventory.
Equip the Pixel Sword.
Check on Vanellope's "battle" with Mother Gothel... just in case.
Talk to Vanellope.

Gather materials and fish for the lure:
  ‧ 1 Kingfish.
  ‧ 3 Herring.
  ‧ 30 Softwood.
  ‧ 30 Fiber.
Craft the Scar Lure.
Place the Scar Lure near Scar's Cave.
Meet Vanellope near Scar's Cave.
Enter Scar's Cave.
Face off with Scar.
Return to Vanellope.
Collect and open the sweet loot in Scar's Cave.
Show Vanellope the mysterious map.

quests.name: Fungeons and Dragons
objectives: Enter Vanellope's House.

Talk to Vanellope.
  ‧ Dress up as the <<Noble/Futurist>> Hero.
  ‧ Dress up in a <<Elegant/Futuristic>> costume.
(Optional) Order an <<Elegant/Futuristic>> costume from the store.

You're dressed for adventure!
  ‧ Return to Vanellope.
Visit the "Rat's Inn" and find the Wizard.
Find the Wizard to start your adventure.
Return to the Storyteller, Vanellope.
Enter the Mystical Cave on Dazzle Beach.
Find the next key guardian at the bottom of the Mystical Cave.
Return to the Storyteller, Vanellope.

Prepare to face the Mastermind.
  ‧ Equip your Pixel Sword.
  ‧ Gather some "healing potions"... or Raspberry Raspberry Boba Tea (3).
  ‧ Find the Monster Bestiary in Arendelle Castle.
Enter the Mastermind's lair -- the Vitalys Mines on the Sunlit Plateau.
Confront the Mastermind in the Mines
Reach the dragon in the Vitalys Mines by breaking down doors and battling monsters.
Slay the dragon to reach the Princess.
Speak with Princess Lightyear

Finish your adventure:
  ‧ (Optional) Tell the Mastermind you foiled his plan.
  ‧ Exit the Mines.
Meet Vanellope in her House.
Give the chest keys to Vanellope.
The secret chest is finally unlocked. Open it up from your Inventory!
Complete your adventure by talking with Vanellope.
rewards:
Vanellope's Adventure Chest, Contains
  ‧ Cardboard Cyclops
  ‧ Cardboard Cyclops Monster Panel
  ‧ Cardboard Door Panel
  ‧ Cardboard Dragon Panel
  ‧ Cardboard Fire
  ‧ Cardboard Fire Monster Panel
  ‧ Cardboard Ogre Panel
  ‧ Cardboard Scary Monster Panel

quests.name: A Holiday Treat for Vanellope
objectives: Ask Remy for some advice.

Gather the following Ingredients:
  ‧ 1 Dreamlight Fruit.
  ‧ 1 Vanilla.
  ‧ 2 Sugarcane.
Cook up a Candy Skull.
Make sure you have the Candy Skull in your Inventory.
Bring the Candy Skull to Jack Skellington.

quests.name: Valley Visits!
objectives:
Vanellope has discovered something odd...
  ‧ Talk to Vanellope.
Place the Valley Visit Station outside and then talk to it when you want to open a connection.

quests.name: Vanellope: The Next Level
objectives: Talk to Minnie.

Gather the materials for Minnie:
  ‧ 10 Fabric.
  ‧ 3 Gold Ingots.
  ‧ 10 Red Bromeliads.
Bring the materials to Minnie.
Make sure you have the Dress to Impress in your Inventory.
Bring the Dress to Impress to Vanellope.
Return to Daisy.
